mapper.insert: insert into dish(id, name, category_id, price, code, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{code}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser} )

insert into dish_flavor(id, dish_id, name, value, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{id}, #{dishId}, #{name},#{value}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.update: update dish set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, image=#{image}, description=#{description}, category_id=#{categoryId}, update_time=#{updateTime}, update_user=#{updateUser} where id=#{id}
